summary: This is my attempt to enhance the Amulet of Gauldur and to make it coherent with its legend, whithout making it too overpowered.
descriptionHtml:
This is my attempt to enhance the Amulet of Gauldur and to make it coherent with its legend, whithout making it (imho) too overpowered.

The enchantment is now:
+50 to Health, Magicka and Stamina
+25% to Health, Magicka and Stamina regeneration rate

I\'ve taken inspiration by Zaldir\'s \"Legendary Gauldur Amulet\", available here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3392 ;)

Italian and English version available.
Polish version available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112173475

Installation: 
Extract the .esp in your data folder and activate the plugin in Data Files or with the Mod Manager
author: Nekrovision
